description: Enable seamless integration of Groww platform data and tools with language models to enhance financial decision-making and automation. Provide access to Groww-specific resources, execute financial operations, and utilize predefined prompts for investment workflows. Simplify interaction with Groww services through a standardized protocol for LLM applications.

apiKey.description: API key for the Groww API

capabilities.name: download_instruments_csv
capabilities.description: Download/refresh the complete instruments CSV file from Groww containing all tradeable instruments

capabilities.name: search_instruments
capabilities.description: Search for instruments by name, trading symbol, groww symbol, or other criteria from the loaded instruments data

capabilities.name: get_instrument_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific instrument by trading symbol

capabilities.name: place_order
capabilities.description: Place a new order in the market (stocks, F&O, etc.) - Official Groww API: POST /v1/order/create

capabilities.name: modify_order
capabilities.description: Modify an existing pending or open order

capabilities.name: cancel_order
capabilities.description: Cancel an existing pending or open order

capabilities.name: get_order_status
capabilities.description: Get the status of an order by Groww order ID

capabilities.name: get_order_status_by_reference
capabilities.description: Get the status of an order by user reference ID

capabilities.name: get_order_list
capabilities.description: Get list of all orders for the day

capabilities.name: get_order_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific order

capabilities.name: get_order_trades
capabilities.description: Get all trades/executions for a specific order

capabilities.name: get_holdings
capabilities.description: Get current stock holdings in DEMAT account

capabilities.name: get_positions
capabilities.description: Get all trading positions for the user

capabilities.name: get_position_by_symbol
capabilities.description: Get position for a specific trading symbol

capabilities.name: get_user_margin
capabilities.description: Get available margin details for the user

capabilities.name: calculate_margin_requirement
capabilities.description: Calculate required margin for orders (single or basket)

capabilities.name: get_live_quote
capabilities.description: Get complete live market data for an instrument

capabilities.name: get_ltp
capabilities.description: Get Last Traded Price for multiple instruments (up to 50)

capabilities.name: get_ohlc
capabilities.description: Get OHLC data for multiple instruments (up to 50)

capabilities.name: get_current_date
capabilities.description: Get current date and time information for reference in historical data requests

capabilities.name: get_historical_data
capabilities.description: Get historical candle data for an instrument. CONSTRAINTS: 1min(3days,3mo), 5min(15days,3mo), 10min(30days,3mo), 1hr(150days,3mo), 4hr(365days,3mo), daily(1080days,unlimited), weekly(unlimited,unlimited)

capabilities.name: calculate_moving_averages
capabilities.description: Calculate Simple Moving Average (SMA) and Exponential Moving Average (EMA) for historical data

capabilities.name: calculate_rsi
capabilities.description: Calculate Relative Strength Index (RSI) for technical analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_bollinger_bands
capabilities.description: Calculate Bollinger Bands for volatility analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_support_resistance
capabilities.description: Identify support and resistance levels from historical price data

capabilities.name: calculate_volatility_metrics
capabilities.description: Calculate various volatility metrics for risk assessment

capabilities.name: calculate_macd
capabilities.description: Calculate MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence) for trend and momentum analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_stochastic
capabilities.description: Calculate Stochastic Oscillator for momentum analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_williams_r
capabilities.description: Calculate Williams %R for momentum analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_adx
capabilities.description: Calculate ADX (Average Directional Index) for trend strength analysis

capabilities.name: calculate_fibonacci_levels
capabilities.description: Calculate Fibonacci retracement and extension levels for support/resistance analysis

capabilities.name: analyze_candlestick_patterns
capabilities.description: Identify common candlestick patterns for reversal and continuation signals
